demonlist.Demonlist

class demonlist.Demonlist

Methods

add_level_future(name, video, score, ...)

Adding a level to the future list.

add_level_main(name, level_id, ...[, ...])

Adding a level to the main list.

add_record(user, level, progress, video)

Adding a record.

ban_user(name, months)

Banning the user.

catch_exception(fun)

A decorator taking action if an exception has been raised.

change_badge(login, badge)

Changing a badge of the user.

change_country(login, flag)

Changing a country of the user.

change_nickname(old_user, new_user)

Changing a nickname of the user.

disconnect()

Closing a client session.

get_country_stats(country_name, list_type)

Returns the country's statistics by his name.

get_level_info(level_id)

Returns information about the level by its id.

get_player_stats(player_id)

Returns the user's statistics by his id.

get_top(list_type)

Returns list of levels in order of difficulty.

get_whitelist()

Returns list of whitelisted players.

is_logged_in(fun)

A decorator that checks whether the user is logged into the account.

request(method, path, *[, data])

Sending a request to the server.

requests(request_id, action)

Update the request.

sign_in(login, password)

Logging in to the account.

submit_record(level, progress, video, note)

Sending a record.

unban_user(name)

Unbanning the user.

unwhitelist_user(whitelist_id)

Removing the user from whitelist.

whitelist_user(name)

Adding the user to whitelist.
